      In My Own Words:
      Just here to review stuff I buy/own whilst hopefully helping others too! I try to use a tad of humour just to brighten the day up! If you like/enjoy mine or any reviews, vote positively please as it all helps! All comments are welcome! Good or bad and I will reply.

      Interests

      EasyAcc Bluetooth Headset Wireless Bluetooth 4.0 Stereo Headphone with Microphone Hands Free for i&hellip by EasyAcc
      3 of 3 people found the following review helpful
      Very good Bluetooth headset, 18 Nov 2013
      The EasyAcc Bluetooth 4.0 headset enables the wearer to take handsfree calls and listen to music/audio content from any connected device.

      In the box you get -

      - The Headset (with earhook and eartip fitted)
      - Micro USB to USB charging cable
      - 1 spare earhook
      - 3 spare eartips
      - A car charger
      - Instruction booklet

      I've had a few of these headsets over the years and have found them hit and miss. Not a big fan of them but understandably sometimes they are a necessity in todays hectic world. But they have come a long way in only a few years with better pairing, less hiss and better sound quality.

      This headset at around 2 inches… Read more
      EasyAcc Portable Bluetooth Speaker Mini Speaker wireless bluetooth boxing, Supports: USB sticks an&hellip by EasyAcc
      3 of 3 people found the following review helpful
      Modern design, good sounding speaker, 17 Nov 2013
      The Easy Acc 'LongQG' is a Bluetooth speaker which you can wirelessly play your music/audio from any Bluetooth enabled devices that it can pair up with.

      In the box you will find -

      - The speaker which measures 11(L) x 2.25(H) x 1.5(W) inches
      - Simple instruction leaflet
      - A silver/grey velvet storage pouch
      - A 33 inches long Mini USB to USB charging cable
      - A 33 inches long aux (3.5mm - 3.5mm jack) cable

      The 6 watts of power speaker is very well built from ABS plastic which is tough and durable. The 'LongQG' logo is on the steel mesh front which houses four speakers of 1.5 watts each, is solid. There is no give in this unit, build quality… Read more
      LEGO Marvel Super Heroes (Xbox 360) by Warner Bros. Interactive
      11 of 12 people found the following review helpful
      Fantastic Lego/Marvel game. . ., 15 Nov 2013
      There is 'no' collectable Iron Patriot mini figure with this standard edition! I have posted this review on the limited edition version with the figure with the additional figure description.

      I've bought this Marvel Superheroes game for my Marvel Superhero mad cannot live without his Xbox son! Or was it really for. . . .me? :)

      We must have nearly all the lego franchise games that have been brought out on the Xbox. The first was probably Bionicle and they've came a long way on since then. Lego Star Wars, Batman, Indiana Jones, Lord Of The Rings and Harry Potter amongst our favourites in the past. Batman 2 DC Superheroes probably the best!
